name: High school diploma or equivalent
description: You have a high school diploma or General Equivalency Diploma (GED).

name: Technical or occupational certificate
description: You’ve received training and have specialized skills that can be used in a trade (i.e., mechanical, electrical, carpentry, etc.

name: Associate degree
description: You’ve completed undergraduate studies and earned a 2-year degree at an accredited institution.

name: Bachelor’s degree
description: You’ve got an undergraduate degree from a college or university.

name: Master’s degree
description: You have earned an MBA (graduate degree) from a college or university
